state1.name: View Profile
state1.description: View the user's profile page including their posts, followers, and following details.

state1.name: Edit Profile
state1.description: Open the edit profile screen to update profile information, including bio, name, and other details.

state1.name: Share Profile
state1.description: Share the user's profile with others through available sharing options.

state1.name: Follow User
state1.description: Follow or unfollow the user displayed on the profile by interacting with the 'Follow' button.

state1.name: View Posts
state1.description: View the user's posts, organized in grid view or other display formats like reels or highlights.

state1.name: View Story Highlights
state1.description: View the user's story highlights by interacting with the highlights carousel.

state1.name: View Recent Story
state1.description: View the user's recent story by clicking on their avatar or story thumbnail.

state1.name: Create Highlight
state1.description: Create a new highlight from the user's existing stories by clicking the 'Create Highlight' button.

state1.name: Send Message
state1.description: Send a direct message to the user by clicking on the message icon or button in their profile.

state1.name: View Followers
state1.description: Click on the 'Followers' button to see the list of people following the user.

state1.name: View Following
state1.description: Click on the 'Following' button to see the list of people the user is following.

state1.name: View Profile Picture
state1.description: Click on the user's profile picture to view it in full size or edit the avatar image.

state1.name: Dismiss Suggested User
state1.description: Dismiss a suggested user from the suggestions carousel by clicking the 'Dismiss' button.

state1.name: View Suggested Account
state1.description: View and follow suggested users based on mutual connections or common interests.

state1.name: Scroll Feed
state1.description: Scroll through the user's post feed to view their latest content.

state1.name: Change Avatar
state1.description: Change the user's profile avatar by clicking on the avatar image or button to upload a new picture.

state1.name: View Notifications
state1.description: View notifications for activities like new followers, comments, or likes by interacting with the notification icon in the action bar.

state1.name: Switch Accounts
state1.description: Switch between different Instagram accounts by clicking the account switcher button in the action bar.

state1.name: Refresh Feed
state1.description: Refresh the profile feed by pulling down or using the swipe-refresh feature to load new content.

state10.name: Back
state10.description: Navigate to the previous screen or exit the current view by tapping the 'Back' button.

state10.name: Settings and Activity
state10.description: Access settings and view activity related details on Instagram.

state10.name: Orders and Payments
state10.description: Open the section to review and manage your orders and payments within Instagram.

state10.name: Help

state10.name: Privacy Center
state10.description: Access the Privacy Center to manage your privacy settings and review options for protecting your data.

state10.name: Account Status
state10.description: Check your account status and any related issues within settings.

state10.name: About
state10.description: View information about Instagram, including policies, terms, and other relevant details.

state10.name: Add Account
state10.description: Tap to add a new Instagram account to the app.

state10.name: Log Out
state10.description: Log out from the current Instagram account.

state10.name: Log Out All Accounts
state10.description: Log out from all Instagram accounts currently logged in on the app.

state10.name: Home
state10.description: Navigate to the main feed where you can see posts from followed accounts and new content.

state10.name: Search and Explore
state10.description: Open the search interface to find users, hashtags, and explore recommended content.

state10.name: Create
state10.description: Start creating a new post, story, reel, or other content types on Instagram.

state10.name: Reels
state10.description: Access the Reels section to view short video content shared by users on Instagram.

state10.name: Profile
state10.description: Go to your Instagram profile to view and edit your posts, bio, and account settings.

state13.name: Record Video
state13.description: Press the button to start capturing a video.

state13.name: Stop Video Recording
state13.description: Stop the video recording by pressing the stop button.

state13.name: Navigate to Edit Screen
state13.description: Click the 'Edit' button (id: 16) to go to video editing options.

state13.name: Add Audio
state13.description: Tap the 'Add Audio' button (id: 22) to add background music or sounds to your video.

state13.name: Add Text
state13.description: Tap the 'Add Text' button (id: 23) to overlay text onto the video.

state13.name: Add Sticker
state13.description: Tap the 'Add Sticker' button (id: 24) to insert a sticker or graphic into the video.

state13.name: Apply Effects
state13.description: Tap the 'Effects' button (id: 25) to apply visual effects to the video.

state13.name: Add Voiceover
state13.description: Tap the 'Voiceover' button (id: 26) to record and add a voiceover to the video.

state13.name: Add Additional Clips
state13.description: Tap the 'Add Clips' button (id: 27) to insert additional video clips.

state13.name: Enable Captions
state13.description: Tap the 'Captions' button (id: 28) to add automated captions or subtitles to the video.

state13.name: Save Video
state13.description: Tap the 'Save' button (id: 29) to save your edited video to your gallery.

state13.name: Cancel Edits
state13.description: Press the 'Cancel' button (id: 31) to discard any changes and return to the previous screen.

state13.name: Share Video
state13.description: Tap the 'Share' button (id: 33) to post the edited video to the platform or share it with others.

state13.name: Navigate to Video Preview
state13.description: Watch the recorded video preview in the post-capture preview area.

state13.name: Apply Template
state13.description: Use the template browser (id: 45) to apply predefined templates to the video.

state13.name: Adjust Focus
state13.description: Tap on the 'Focus View' (id: 58) to focus on a specific part of the scene during recording.

state13.name: Adjust Volume
state13.description: Adjust the audio volume by pressing the volume control button (id: 22) during video editing.

state13.name: Preview Video
state13.description: Tap the preview button in the post-capture preview container (id: 39) to view your video before sharing.

state13.name: Open Camera Settings
state13.description: Open the camera tool menu (id: 52) to adjust settings like flash or resolution.

state13.name: Capture Still Image
state13.description: Press the 'Capture' button (within id: 5) to take a snapshot during the video recording.

state13.name: Toggle Camera Modes
state13.description: Use the mode toggle button in the pre-capture control container (id: 43) to switch between camera modes.

state13.name: Enable AR Effects
state13.description: Tap the AR effects button (id: 25) to open augmented reality effects and filters.

state13.name: Use Quick Capture
state13.description: Quickly begin recording by tapping the quick capture button in the top toolbar.

state13.name: Adjust Clip Length
state13.description: Trim or adjust the video length by interacting with the preview container (id: 39).

state5.description: View or modify notification settings related to Instagram. This can be accessed by double-tapping the section labeled 'Notifications' (id 12).

state5.description: View and manage your Instagram usage statistics and set time limits for usage. This option can be accessed by double-tapping the section labeled 'Time management' (id 14).

state5.description: Change the privacy settings of your account, such as making it public or private. Accessible by double-tapping the section labeled 'Account privacy' (id 17).

state5.description: Manage your 'Close Friends' list, controlling who sees your private stories. Accessed by double-tapping the section labeled 'Close Friends' (id 19).

state5.description: Manage your blocked accounts or add new ones. This can be accessed by double-tapping the section labeled 'Blocked' (id 23).

state5.description: Control who can tag or mention you in posts. Accessed by double-tapping the section labeled 'Tags and mentions' (id 30).

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Follow a user by tapping their profile button from the story or post feed.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Unfollow User
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Unfollow a user by tapping the follow button again if you are already following them.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Navigate Between Posts
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Swipe or tap to move to the next or previous post or story in the feed.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Refresh Feed
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Pull down to refresh the feed or check for new updates.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Zoom Image
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Pinch to zoom in or out of an image or photo in the feed.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: View Media Group
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: View a collection of photos or videos grouped under a media group, such as a photo album.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Switch Between Tabs
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Switch between different sections of the app (e.g., Stories, Feed, Explore) by tapping the appropriate tab.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Toggle Notification Settings
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Adjust notification settings for the account or story through the profile or settings menu.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: View Story Reactions
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: View who has reacted to your story or posts.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: Explore New Content
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: Tap on the explore tab to discover new content, including posts, stories, and accounts.

52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.name: View Activity Log
52e92cce957416c52f0c11fa5490fd56.description: View your activity log, including recent posts, likes, comments, and interactions.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Like
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the heart icon to like a post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Comment
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the comment icon to open the comment section of a post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Share
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the share icon to send the post to others.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Save
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the save icon to add the post to your saved collection.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: More Options
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the more options button to access additional actions such as reporting, copying the link, or turning on notifications for the post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Follow
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the username button to follow the user who posted the content.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Avatar View
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on the profile avatar to view the user's profile.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Open Menu
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the menu button (hamburger icon or bottom navigation) to open app-wide navigation options.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Search
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the search tab to explore content, accounts, or tags.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Activity
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the activity tab to view your recent interactions, such as likes, comments, and follows.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Reels
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the Reels tab to view and interact with short video content.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Profile
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the profile tab to view your own Instagram profile.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Camera
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the camera tab to open the camera for posting photos or videos.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Zoom
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Pinch or spread your fingers on an image or video to zoom in or out.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Swipe Navigation
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Swipe left or right to navigate between posts, stories, or other sections of the app.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Story Interaction
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap a story's avatar to view or interact with the user's stories.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Avatar Image
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on the profile picture to view a larger version of the avatar or open the user's profile.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Like More Info
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on the 'Liked by' text to view the list of users who liked the post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: View Carousel
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Swipe left or right on carousel images or videos within a post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Swipe Refresh
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Swipe down on the feed to refresh the content and load new posts.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Post Action
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the more options button (three dots) on a post to perform actions like sharing, saving, or reporting.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Tap to View Post
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on a post to open and view it in full screen, including its media and interactions.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: User Tagging
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on tags within a post to view the tagged user's profile.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: View Comments
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the comment section to expand and view all comments on a post.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Navigation Bar Interaction
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Use the bottom navigation bar to quickly switch between tabs (Home, Search, Camera, Reels, Profile).

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: View Notifications
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the notification icon to view recent interactions and notifications from other users.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Story Seen State
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: View the 'seen' status of stories (e.g., a check mark indicating that you've already viewed the story).

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: Share Post
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap the share icon to send a post to specific users or through other apps.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.name: User Info
1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on a user's profile name to view their profile details and recent posts.

1c7b7442065a11629883a16896df72e2.description: Tap on the post to open the post details, including likes, comments, and sharing options.

219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.description: Share the reel by using the 'Share' button available on the screen.

219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.name: Reshare
219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.description: View the number of times the reel has been reshared with the 'Reshare number' button.

219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.name: Open More Options
219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.description: Access additional options for the reel by using the 'More' button component.

219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.name: Play Audio

219680e7e6aef349ff508ae3508177d7.name: Search and Explore

8e66288bf12723f543255baadf81b933.description: Adjust various effects on your media post-capture, enhancing its aesthetics or providing unique styles.

3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.name: Add to story
3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.description: Select photos from gallery to add to story.

3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.name: Camera
3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.description: Take a photo or video and add it to your story.

3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.name: Draft
3b9229ca9d1dc3b37648f6498e2a53e9.description: Select content from your draft to add to your story.

state12.name: Log In
state12.description: Sign in to your account by clicking the 'Log in' button.

state12.name: Log Into Another Account
state12.description: Sign in using a different Instagram account by clicking the 'Log into another account' button.

state12.name: Create New Account
state12.description: Register a new Instagram account by clicking the 'Create new account' button.

state14.name: Edit Cover
state14.description: Click on the 'Edit cover' option to make adjustments to the cover photo.

state14.name: Write Caption
state14.description: Click on the caption input area to write a caption and add hashtags.

state14.name: Add Hashtags
state14.description: Use the hashtags suggestion option to add relevant hashtags to your post.

state14.name: Create Poll
state14.description: Use the poll suggestion option to create and add a poll to your post.

state14.name: Tag People
state14.description: Select the 'Tag people' option to tag users in your post.

state14.name: Add Location
state14.description: Click on the 'Add location' option to include a location with the post.

state14.name: Choose Audience
state14.description: Select 'Audience' to decide who can see the post, e.g., everyone.

state14.name: Set Profile Display
state14.description: Choose profile display settings to determine where this post will appear, such as the Main grid and Reels grid.

state14.name: Rename Audio
state14.description: Select 'Rename audio' to change the name of the audio associated with the post.

state14.name: Save Draft
state14.description: Click on the 'Save draft' button to save your current progress on the post as a draft for later editing or sharing.

state14.name: Share Post
state14.description: Press the 'Share' button to publish the post to your profile immediately.

state17.name: Edit Highlight Cover
state17.description: Tap the 'Edit cover' link to change the cover image for a highlight.

state17.name: Edit Highlight Title
state17.description: Tap the 'highlight_title' button to modify the title of a highlight.

state17.name: Select Media
state17.description: Tap on media images to select or deselect them using the 'selected_item_overlay' and 'media_toggle' buttons.

state18.name: Edit Highlight Cover
state18.description: Click on the action bar title (id=18) to open the cover editing interface.

state15.name: Browse stories
state15.description: Navigate through different pictures of your story using the browse button.

state15.name: Create Story Highlight
state15.description: Access the option to create a story highlight from a reel.

state15.name: Send Story
state15.description: Send the current story to another user through a reshare button.

state15.name: More Options
state15.description: Open additional settings and options related to the reel viewer with the more options button.

sttae16.name: Share the picture of Story
sttae16.description: Send the current story to another user through a reshare button.

sttae16.name: Copy link
sttae16.description: Copy the link of the story.

sttae16.name: Show QR code
sttae16.description: Show the QR code of the story.

state11.name: Log Out Prompt
state11.description: The user is presented with a prompt asking if they are sure they want to log out of their account.

state11.name: Log Out Confirmation
state11.description: The user can confirm their decision to log out by clicking the 'Log out' button.

state11.name: Cancel Log Out
state11.description: The user can cancel the log-out operation by clicking the 'Cancel' button.

state11.name: Open Dialog
state11.description: The dialog containing the log-out confirmation and cancel options is displayed on the screen.

state11.name: Scroll Through Content
state11.description: The user can scroll through the content in the scrollable area (identified by the 'scroll_view' div).

state11.name: Interact with Sticky Footer
state11.description: The user can interact with elements in the sticky footer at the bottom of the screen, which might contain navigation options or other actionable buttons.

state11.name: Close Dialog
state11.description: The user can close the dialog without taking any action, usually by pressing the 'Cancel' button or tapping outside the dialog.

state11.name: Confirm Action
state11.description: The user can click the primary action button (Log out) to confirm their action.
